actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: To protect the integrity of the social security trust funds and to reform the budget process.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974 to exclude the receipts and disbursements of the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund from calculations of maximum deficit amounts. Increases the permissible deficit amounts for FY 1990 through 1993.

titles.title: To protect the integrity of the social security trust funds and to reform the budget process.
